game.name: SuperDrome Bugs
game.desc: Simon Pray ( or S.Pray for friends) it's a pest extinguisher living in Mexico, but for some reason pests are nowhere to be found, and that translates to: no work, which means no money, which means hard life. One day S. Pray receives a call from a luxurious mansion offering him a job. Something doesn't seem right, but Simon doesn't have time to think about it, he needs the money!. Join S.Pray and help him get rid of the pests!
